short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Fear & Greed Index directly on Chrome toolbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto Fear & Greed Index is a browser extension for Chrome and derivate browsers, that shows the latest Crypto Fear & Greed Index, taken directly from alternative.to using its API.
